author: Devdiscourse News Desk
title: KPI Green Energy Secures Major 100 MW Hybrid Energy Project | Headlines
text: KPI Green Energy Secures Major 100 MW Hybrid Energy Project KPI Green Energy announces a significant order for a 100 MW hybrid energy project from Aether Industries, set to be completed by the financial year 2024-25 in various tranches. The company remains tight-lipped about further details but underscores its focus on renewable energy. [Devdiscourse News Desk](/devdiscourse-stories)| New Delhi | Updated: 19-07-2024 12:36 IST | Created: 19-07-2024 12:36 IST - Country: - India KPI Green Energy confirmed on Friday that it has secured a major order for a 100 MW hybrid energy project from Aether Industries. According to the company's exchange filing, the projects are slated for completion in various tranches during the financial year 2024-25. 'We have received a new order for a 100 MW hybrid captive solar power project under the captive power producer segment of the company,' said KPI Green Energy. The company, however, withheld additional details regarding the order. Previously known as KPI Global Infrastructure Limited, KPI Green Energy Ltd operates as the renewable energy arm of the KP Group. (With inputs from agencies.) Advertisement

author: Get News
title: Air 1 Moving & Storage: The Premier Long Distance Moving Company in Los Angeles, CA | Markets | bigspringherald.com
text:
Los Angeles, CA - Air 1 Moving & Storage, a trusted name in the moving and storage industry, is proud to announce its exceptional services as a leading long distance moving company in Los Angeles, CA. With a strong commitment to customer satisfaction and a track record of successful moves, Air 1 Moving & Storage is the go-to choice for individuals and families planning a long distance relocation.
Moving to a new city or state can be a daunting task, but Air 1 Moving & Storage is dedicated to making the process seamless and stress-free. With years of experience and a team of highly skilled professionals, they understand the unique challenges that come with long distance moves and are prepared to handle every aspect with expertise and care.
"We know that long distance moves can be overwhelming, which is why we strive to provide our clients with exceptional service and support," said a spokesperson for Air 1 Moving & Storage. "Our team is committed to ensuring a smooth transition for our customers, whether they are moving across the state or across the country. From packing and loading to transportation and unpacking, we are here to make their long distance move a success."
Air 1 Moving & Storage offers a comprehensive range of services to meet the specific needs of each client's long distance move, including:
Professional Packing: Skillful packing of belongings using high-quality materials and techniques to ensure safe transportation.
Furniture Disassembly and Assembly: Expert disassembly and reassembly of furniture to protect it during the move and save time.
Secure Storage Solutions: Climate-controlled storage facilities to accommodate any belongings that need to be stored during the transition.
Efficient Transportation: Modern and well-maintained fleet of trucks equipped with state-of-the-art technology for secure and timely transportation.
Dedicated Moving Crews: Highly trained and experienced moving crews who handle every aspect of the move with professionalism and attention to detail.
Personalized Moving Plans: Tailored moving plans that accommodate specific needs, timelines, and budgets.
Air 1 Moving & Storage takes pride in its commitment to customer satisfaction. They prioritize clear communication, transparency, and reliability, ensuring that clients are informed and involved in every step of the moving process. Their team goes above and beyond to deliver exceptional service, ensuring that belongings arrive safely and on time.
For more information about Air 1 Moving & Storage's long distance moving services or to request a free quote, please visit https://air1moving.com/ - https://air1movingandstoragelosangeles.wordpress.com/2023/12/28/press-release-oct-movers/ or contact us at (866)485-1030.
About Air 1 Moving & Storage:
Air 1 Moving & Storage is a leading moving and storage company based in Los Angeles, CA. With a focus on exceptional service and customer satisfaction, Air 1 Moving & Storage specializes in providing reliable and professional long distance moving solutions. Their team of experts is dedicated to making the moving process as smooth and stress-free as possible.

author: MarketScreener
title: OPUS GLOBAL : Extraordinary Information - MarketScreener
text:
EXTRAORDINARY ANNOUNCEMENT
OPUS GLOBAL Nyilvánosan Működő Részvénytársaság (in English: OPUS GLOBAL Public Limited
Company) (registered seat: 59 Andrássy Road, Budapest 1062, Hungary; company registration
number: 01-10-042533; hereinafter referred to as: ' Company ') hereby informs the Esteemed Investors that based on the application submitted by the Company, the Company Registry Court of Budapest-Capital Regional Court, on the 18 th July 2024 by its decision Cg.01-10-042533/492, has ordered the registration of the share capital decrease 1 decided by the Resolution No. 7/2024 (IV.24.) of the General Meeting, and the registration of the related amendment of the Articles of Association of the Company.
After the registration of the share capital decrease, the Company continues its operation with the share capital of HUF 17,459,481,700. -, i.e. seventeen billion four hundred and fifty-nine million four hundred and eighty-one thousand seven hundred Hungarian forints. Following the registration of the share capital decrease, the share capital of the Company consists of a total of 698,379,268 shares.
The Company hereby publishes its Articles of Association in-effect in accordance with the concerning regulation.
Budapest, 19 th July 2024
OPUS GLOBAL Plc.

author: WTHR.com staff
title: IMPD: Man arrested for role in deadly shooting at northeast side apartment complex
text:
INDIANAPOLIS — A man was arrested Thursday for his alleged role in a deadly shooting on Indianapolis' northeast side in late December.
On Dec. 28, IMPD officers responded to an apartment complex in the
3400 block of Alsuda Court, just northeast of Binford Boulevard and East 46th Street, shortly before 3 a.m. for a report of a person shot.
Police found a man outside an apartment building who was pronounced dead at the scene.
The Marion County Coroner's Office identified the victim as 31-year-old Joshua Hopson.
An IMPD spokesperson said shortly after that, preliminary information led police to believe the victim was involved in a disturbance before he was shot. The suspect was not at the scene when officers arrived.
On Thursday, Jan. 5, IMPD officers with the Violent Crimes Unit located and arrested Emmanuel Newman for his alleged role in the shooting.
The Marion County Prosecutor's Office will review the case and make final charging decisions.
Anyone with information on the incident is asked to contact Detective Kyle Hoover at the IMPD Homicide Office at 317-327-3475 or Kyle.Hoover@indy.gov. Tips can also be submitted anonymously to Crime Stoppers of Central Indiana at 317-262-8477.

author: Resumen Latinoamericano
title: Estados Unidos. Empleados de Amazon convocan a huelga global el fin de semana por demandas laborales
text:
TeleSUR, Resumen Latinoamericano, 29 de noviembre de 2024.
La huelga está sumando al menos 20 naciones, incluidas Estados Unidos (EE.UU.) y el Reino Unido, Francia, Alemania e India. La Federación sindical UNI Global Unión y la organización política Internacional Progresista o IP (en inglés, Progressive International, PI) convocaron este viernes a los trabajadores de Amazon a una huelga global desde este 29 de noviembre y hasta el lunes 2 de diciembre.
“Los trabajadores estamos hartos y nos estamos organizando para ganar el salario justo, los empleos seguros y el respeto que merecemos. ¡Únete a nosotros!”, refirió Teamsters de Amazon en la red social X.
La huelga está sumando al menos 20 naciones, incluidas Estados Unidos (EE.UU.) y el Reino Unido, Francia, Alemania e India, con el objetivo de demandar la responsabilizar a Amazon por los abusos laborales y la degradación ambiental y las amenazas a la democracia.
Los organizadores tienen previsto que la huelga se desarrolle durante uno de los fines de semana más importantes de la compañía, desde el Black Friday hasta el Cyber ​​​​Monday.
En este sentido, los líderes sindicales de todo el mundo se encuentran más organizados para enfrentar a las grandes corporaciones.
« Así como Amazon se traslada de un país a otro para evitar impuestos y de un almacén a otro para debilitar las huelgas, nosotros también nos estamos organizando en todas partes. En cada etapa de su cadena de suministro global, Amazon ahora enfrenta resistencia «, refirió la organización política Internacional Progresista.
Por su parte, Black Friday, ALU-IBT Local 1, se solidarizó con los trabajadores de Amazon en huelga en todo el mundo.
“ Juntos luchamos por salarios justos, lugares de trabajo seguros y la dignidad que merecemos como trabajadores que ganan miles de millones de dólares en Amazo n”, agregaron en la red social X.

author: @prokerala
title: ISL 2023-24: Chennaiyin FC lose 0-3 to Mumbai City
text: Mumbai, Dec 28 : Chennaiyin FC suffered a 0-3 loss against Mumbai City FC in the Indian Super League (ISL) 2023-24 match at the Mumbai Football Arena on Thursday. Lallianzuala Chhangte scored the opening goal of the match for the home team in the 52nd minute. Vikram Partap Singh (80th) and Gurkirat Singh (90th) netted second and third goal respectively for the winning side. Coming into the match after defeats in their respective last matches, both the teams started aggressively. Chennaiyin looked solid in defence as well as they denied the hosts a few close scoring chances early in the match. Chennaiyin came close to scoring their first goal in the 11th minute but Sarthak Goluiâ€™s shot missed the target. Mumbai City were given a spot kick in the 36th minute when Vikram drew a foul in the penalty area. However, Chhangte failed to convert it as his left-footed shot hit the bar. The visitors once again demonstrated their defensive prowess when Ryan Edwards impressively blocked Jorge Pereyra Diazâ€™s strike in front of the goal just before the break. The Islanders managed to take the lead seven minutes into the second half when Chhangte found the target. Later, Vikram converted a penalty kick to make it 2-0 for Mumbai City. Owen Coyleâ€™s men gave their all in order to make a comeback. However, Gurkirat scored Mumbai Cityâ€™s third goal to take the game further away. Chennaiyin have concluded the first half of the season with 12 poi nts.

author: R. V.
title: República Dominicana premia o compromiso investidor de Ecoener pola súa contribución á sustentabilidade e a economía do país - Faro de Vigo
text: Ecoener recibió el máximo “Reconocimiento a la inversión extranjera directa en la República Dominicana”, concedido en la edición 2024 durante un evento que tuvo lugar en la sede del Banco Central del país. La distinción, otorgada por ProDominicana (Centro de Exportación e Inversión del gobierno de la República Dominicana), premia la trayectoria y la aportación de la compañía presidida por Luis de Valdivia, en su apuesta por ampliar sus operaciones y contribuir positivamente al desarrollo económico y social del país. Durante el evento, se puso también en valor la contribución de Ecoener a la soberanía energética del país y en la lucha contra el cambio climático. El presidente de la República Dominicana, Luis Abinader Corona entregó el galardón al vicepresidente ejecutivo de Ecoener, Fernando Rodríguez Alfonso. República Dominicana ha experimentado un notable crecimiento, convirtiéndose en una economía de referencia en Latinoamérica. Su PIB ha aumentado entorno al 5% de media anual en los últimos años como destaca un reciente estudio del Fondo Monetario Internacional (FMI). Rodríguez Alfonso agradeció este reconocimiento y manifestó que “la economía de República Dominicana está creciendo de manera sostenida y estable. Desde Ecoener queremos contribuir a este progreso invirtiendo y haciendo crecer nuestra compañía de manera sólida, como lo está haciendo el país”. En el acto estuvieron también presentes el ministro de Industria, Comercio y Mypimes, Víctor Bizonó; el ministro de la Presidencia, Joel Santos; la directora ejecutiva de ProDominicana, Biviana Riveiro, o el embajador de España en la República Dominicana, Antonio Pérez-Hernández y Torra, entre otras autoridades. En este momento, el plan de inversión de Ecoener en la República Dominica alcanza los 289 millones de dólares para la puesta en marcha de 5 parques fotovoltaicos que aportarán a la empresa 279 MW de potencia instalada. Dos de ellos, Cumayasa 1 y 2 (97 MW), se encuentran en operación desde el pasado mes de noviembre. Estas instalaciones producen el volumen de energía equivalente al consumo anual de 48.000 hogares, evitan la emisión anual de 140.000 toneladas de CO2 a la atmósfera y el consumo de 17.000 toneladas de combustibles fósiles. Ecoener generó 300 puestos de trabajo en su construcción y la instalación de los paneles fue realizada mayoritariamente por mujeres, formadas y empleadas específicamente para ello. Cumayasa 1 y 2, que contó con una inversión de 100 millones de dólares, incorporan además una novedosa experiencia de agrivoltaica, en la que se combina la producción de energía solar con el pastoreo. Es un modo de implicar y favorecer la simbiosis de la compañía con la sociedad local, conjugando seguridad alimentaria y energética de manera equilibrada y respetuosa con el medio ambiente. Además de las instalaciones ya operativas, Ecoener está construyendo otras tres plantas fotovoltaicas en República Dominicana. Por un lado, Cumayasa 4 (62 MW), ubicada en la provincia de La Romana y donde la compañía está invirtiendo más de 63 millones de dólares. Por otro lado, las plantas Payita 1 y 2 (60 MW cada una), localizadas en el norte del país, y en las que Ecoener realiza una inversión conjunta de 126 millones de dólares. Estos tres activos de Ecoener poseerán una capacidad de producción anual conjunta equivalente al consumo de 93.000 hogares, evitarán el consumo de 34.000 toneladas de combustibles fósiles y la emisión de cerca de 200.000 toneladas de CO2 a la atmósfera.

author: 新浪網
title: 報告：歐洲仍為中國遊戲出海重要區域 - 新浪香港
text:
近日，遊戲出版工作委員會與遊戲產業研究專家委員會發佈《中國遊戲產業報告》。
報告顯示，2025年上半年中國遊戲市場實際銷售收入達1680億元，同比增長14.08%，創曆史新高。
同期，遊戲用戶規模接近6.79億，同比增長0.72%，亦為曆史新高點。
2025年1-6月，自主研發遊戲國內市場實際銷售收入1404.52億元，同比增長19.25%。自研遊戲海外市場實際銷售收入95.01億美元，同比增長11.07%。
2025年1-6月，自主研發移動遊戲海外市場實際銷售收入地區分佈中，美國占比31.96%，日本占比16.20%，韓國占比7.47%，依然為主要海外目標市場，合計占比55.63%。此外，德國、英國、法國三國市場合計占比8.78%，歐洲仍為中國遊戲出海重要區域。
